mapper.sql: cdlicense, cdno, moid, cddriver, cddriverphone, cddriverbirth, clid, cdlicenseend, cdframe, mid, cdyearprice, cdmileage, cdload, cdbuydate, cdgolicense, cdcarcheckdate, fid, inid, indate, inid_business, inid_bdate, cdisinsure, cdnextmileage, cdnextkeepdate, cno, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select: SELECT card.*, carb.cbname cbnam, moto.moiname moiname, mainte.mname mname, cl.clname clname, fu.fname fname FROM cardata AS card LEFT JOIN carbrand AS carb ON card.cdno=carb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS moto ON card.cdno=moto.cbno LEFT JOIN maintenance AS mainte ON mainte.mid=moto.mid LEFT JOIN carbelong AS cl ON card.clid=cl.clid LEFT JOIN fuel AS fu ON card.fid=fu.fid WHERE card.cno=#{cno}

SELECT ca.*,cb.cbname cbnam,m.moiname moiname FROM cardata AS ca LEFT JOIN carbrand AS cb ON ca.cdno=cb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS m ON m.cbno = cb.cbno WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, ca.cdlicenseend ,NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 3 AND ca.moid=m.moid

SELECT card.*, carb.cbname cbnam, moto.moiname moiname, mainte.mname mname, cl.clname clname, fu.fname fname, cus.cname cname FROM cardata AS card LEFT JOIN carbrand AS carb ON card.cdno=carb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS moto ON card.cdno=moto.cbno LEFT JOIN maintenance AS mainte ON mainte.mid=moto.mid LEFT JOIN carbelong AS cl ON card.clid=cl.clid LEFT JOIN fuel AS fu ON card.fid=fu.fid LEFT JOIN customer AS cus ON card.cno=cus.cno WHERE (card.cddriver LIKE concat('%',#{cddriver},'%') OR card.cddriverphone LIKE concat('%',#{cddriver},'%') OR card.cdlicense LIKE concat('%',#{cddriver},'%') OR card.cdframe LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cddriver},'%') ) AND moto.moid=card.moid

SELECT card.*,ct.ctname ctname, carb.cbname cbnam, moto.moiname moiname, cus.cname cname FROM cardata AS card LEFT JOIN carbrand AS carb ON card.cdno=carb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS moto ON card.cdno=moto.cbno LEFT JOIN customer AS cus ON card.cno=cus.cno LEFT JOIN customer_type AS ct ON cus.ctno=ct.ctno WHERE moto.moid=card.moid AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, card.indate ,NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 3 OR TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, card.inid_bdate ,NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 3)

SELECT card.*,ct.ctname ctname, carb.cbname cbnam, moto.moiname moiname, cus.cname cname FROM cardata AS card LEFT JOIN carbrand AS carb ON card.cdno=carb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS moto ON card.cdno=moto.cbno LEFT JOIN customer AS cus ON card.cno=cus.cno LEFT JOIN customer_type AS ct ON cus.ctno=ct.ctno WHERE moto.moid=card.moid AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, card.cdcarcheckdate ,NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 3

SELECT card.*,ct.ctname ctname, carb.cbname cbnam, moto.moiname moiname, cus.cname cname FROM cardata AS card LEFT JOIN carbrand AS carb ON card.cdno=carb.cbno LEFT JOIN motorcycle AS moto ON card.cdno=moto.cbno LEFT JOIN customer AS cus ON card.cno=cus.cno LEFT JOIN customer_type AS ct ON cus.ctno=ct.ctno WHERE moto.moid=card.moid AND MONTH(card.cddriverbirth) = MONTH(NOW()) AND DAY(card.cddriverbirth) = DAY(NOW())

select
distinct
from cardata
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cardata (cdlicense, cdno, moid, cddriver, cddriverphone, cddriverbirth, clid, cdlicenseend, cdframe, mid, cdyearprice, cdmileage, cdload, cdbuydate, cdgolicense, cdcarcheckdate, fid, inid, indate, inid_business, inid_bdate, cdisinsure, cdnextmileage, cdnextkeepdate, cno, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5 ) values (#{cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cddriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cddriverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cddriverbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdlicenseend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdframe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cdload,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cdbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdgolicense,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdcarcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inidBusiness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inidBdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdisinsure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdnextmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cdnextkeepdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update cardata
cdlicense = #{record.cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cdno = #{record.cdno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
moid = #{record.moid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cddriver = #{record.cddriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cddriverphone = #{record.cddriverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cddriverbirth = #{record.cddriverbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
clid = #{record.clid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdlicenseend = #{record.cdlicenseend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdframe = #{record.cdframe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdyearprice = #{record.cdyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cdmileage = #{record.cdmileage,jdbcType=REAL},
cdload = #{record.cdload,jdbcType=REAL},
cdbuydate = #{record.cdbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdgolicense = #{record.cdgolicense,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdcarcheckdate = #{record.cdcarcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inid = #{record.inid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
indate = #{record.indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inid_business = #{record.inidBusiness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inid_bdate = #{record.inidBdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdisinsure = #{record.cdisinsure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdnextmileage = #{record.cdnextmileage,jdbcType=REAL},
cdnextkeepdate = #{record.cdnextkeepdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cno = #{record.cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update cardata set cdlicense = #{record.cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdno = #{record.cdno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, moid = #{record.moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cddriver = #{record.cddriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cddriverphone = #{record.cddriverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cddriverbirth = #{record.cddriverbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clid = #{record.clid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdlicenseend = #{record.cdlicenseend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdframe = #{record.cdframe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdyearprice = #{record.cdyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdmileage = #{record.cdmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, cdload = #{record.cdload,jdbcType=REAL}, cdbuydate = #{record.cdbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdgolicense = #{record.cdgolicense,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdcarcheckdate = #{record.cdcarcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inid = #{record.inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indate = #{record.indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inid_business = #{record.inidBusiness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inid_bdate = #{record.inidBdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdisinsure = #{record.cdisinsure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdnextmileage = #{record.cdnextmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, cdnextkeepdate = #{record.cdnextkeepdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cno = #{record.cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cardata
cdno = #{cdno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
moid = #{moid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cddriver = #{cddriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cddriverphone = #{cddriverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cddriverbirth = #{cddriverbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
clid = #{clid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdlicenseend = #{cdlicenseend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdframe = #{cdframe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

cdmileage = #{cdmileage,jdbcType=REAL},
cdload = #{cdload,jdbcType=REAL},
cdbuydate = #{cdbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdgolicense = #{cdgolicense,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cdcarcheckdate = #{cdcarcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

indate = #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

cdisinsure = #{cdisinsure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdnextmileage = #{cdnextmileage,jdbcType=REAL},
cdnextkeepdate = #{cdnextkeepdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where cdlicense = #{cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cardata set cdno = #{cdno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, moid = #{moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cddriver = #{cddriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cddriverphone = #{cddriverphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cddriverbirth = #{cddriverbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clid = #{clid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdlicenseend = #{cdlicenseend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdframe = #{cdframe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdyearprice = #{cdyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdmileage = #{cdmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, cdload = #{cdload,jdbcType=REAL}, cdbuydate = #{cdbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdgolicense = #{cdgolicense,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdcarcheckdate = #{cdcarcheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inid = #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indate = #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inid_business = #{inidBusiness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inid_bdate = #{inidBdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cdisinsure = #{cdisinsure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cdnextmileage = #{cdnextmileage,jdbcType=REAL}, cdnextkeepdate = #{cdnextkeepdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cdlicense = #{cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
